column5: was wondering if anyone has been here this year or in recent years. how is the fishing?? are there places to camp??was thinking of going here for 2 or 3 days next week, any other suggestions about the area would be greatly appreciatedthanks alotjale6666
guess no one has ever been here...loljale6666

baskatong is a big lake, can get a little wild at times with the wind lots of shore line , had good catchs of walleye, bass and pike. leeches and worms work well. this is a beutiful lake. lots of camping, great for family, big sandy beaches. good roads.haven,t been there in a few years but talked to a few who just got back. hope this helps bob and his fishing dog stella
